text: The second season of The Voice, the Indian reality talent show, premiered on 10 December 2016 and concluded on 12 March 2017, with Farhan Sabir being crowned as the winner. The reality series is produced by Urban Brew Studios for &TV.; ==Coaches and hosts== Shaan was announced as returning coach; Neeti Mohan, Salim Merchant and Benny Dayal joined Shaan. Karan Tacker was replaced by Gunjan Utreja as the host of the season. Sugandha Mishra joined Utreja as the co-host. ==Series overview== : Winner : Runner-up : Third place : Fourth place Each coach was allowed to advance three top to the live shows: {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:100%; width:70%;" |- | style="width:13%;" scope="col" bgcolor="#fffa73"| '''''' | style="width:13%;" scope="col" bgcolor="#dda0dd"| '''''' | style="width:13%;" scope="col" bgcolor="afeeee"| '''''' | style="width:13%;" scope="col" bgcolor="#FFE5B4"| '''''' |- | bgcolor=""| Paras Maan | bgcolor="lightgreen"| Niyam Kanungo | bgcolor="silver"| Rasika Borkar | bgcolor="gold"| Farhan Sabir |- | Yashodhan Rao | Neha Bhanushali | Sona Vakil | bgcolor="tan"| Parakhjeet Singh |- | Sharayu Date | Danish | Divyansh Verma | Neha Khankriyal |} ==Teams== ;Color key {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; line-height:17px; width:100%;" |- !
